title: depict
text: depict R wrapper around wonderful depiction api written John May. entire CDK team, especially John, steadily improving visualization features CDK. depiction API succinct powerful provides access vary large amount end-user desired functionality small number composable functions. design API now relatively straightforward design simple streamlined interface allow users quickly easily generate beautiful graphics.

title: depict
text: simple wrapper around cdk’s excellent depict module.
code: library(depict) library(magrittr) library(grid)  # you must supply java colors  color <- J("java.awt.Color")  # load in penicillin pen  <- parse_smiles("CC1(C(N2C(S1)C(C2=O)NC(=O)CC3=CC=CC=C3)C(=O)[O-])C penicillin") cav  <- parse_smiles("CN1C=NC2=C1C(=O)N(C(=O)N2C)C")  # define the regions to highlight # either all atoms/bonds # or a SMARTS-defined subregion atms <- pen$atoms() bnds <- pen$bonds() lactam <- match_smarts("C1(=O)NCC1", pen)  # use piping to change the behavior as desired depiction() %>%   highlight_atoms(atms, color$LIGHT_GRAY) %>%   highlight_atoms(bnds, color$LIGHT_GRAY) %>%   highlight_atoms(lactam, color$RED) %>%   set_size(400, 400) %>%   set_zoom(3) %>%   outerglow() %>%   add_title() %>%   depict(pen) %>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

title: depict
code: insulinmol <- system.file("molfiles/ChEBI_5931.mol", package="depict") insulin    <- read_mol(insulinmol)  cysteine <- match_smarts("C(=O)C(CS)N", insulin) xlinks   <- match_smarts("SS", insulin)  dp <- depiction()%>%    set_size(700, 400) %>%   set_zoom(10) %>%   outerglow() %>%   highlight_atoms(cysteine, color$YELLOW) %>%   highlight_atoms(xlinks, color$YELLOW) %>%   depict(insulin) %>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

title: depict
text: notes setup: Java can touch OSX particular. doubt try sudo R CMD javareconf reinstall rJava source. Currently using $ operator just functions. makes billion times easier succinct code price performance. performance becomes issue can use low-level calls. important ’m happy accept pull requests. API still flux. currently happy design areas ’d like kick tires bit - especially regards selection. java.awt.colors bit tough warp since many arities classes accepted.. think provide number colors. SMARTS selectors. common smarts selections AminoAcids, Nucleic Acids, Sugars may worth including well.

title: Basic-Use
text: simple wrapper around cdk’s excellent depict module.
code: library(depict) library(magrittr)  # load a smiles string pen  <- parse_smiles("CC1(C(N2C(S1)C(C2=O)NC(=O)CC3=CC=CC=C3)C(=O)[O-])C penicillin")  # `depiction` is the base class; styles are applied to it # `depict` applies the styles to the molecule depiction() %>%   depict(pen) %>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

title: Basic-Use
code: # load a few smiles as AtomContainers atmcontainers <-  purrr::map(   c("CCCC", "CCCCCC", "CCCC1CCC1CC2CCCC2"),   parse_smiles)  # convert them into a java iterable   many_containers <- atomcontainer_list_to_jarray(atmcontainers)   depiction() %>%   set_zoom(10) %>%   depict(many_containers) %>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

title: Basic-Use
code: # you must supply java colors  color <- J("java.awt.Color")  # load in penicillin pen  <- parse_smiles("CC1(C(N2C(S1)C(C2=O)NC(=O)CC3=CC=CC=C3)C(=O)[O-])C penicillin") cav  <- parse_smiles("CN1C=NC2=C1C(=O)N(C(=O)N2C)C")  # define the regions to highlight # either all atoms/bonds # or a SMARTS-defined subregion atms <- pen$atoms() bnds <- pen$bonds() lactam <- match_smarts("C1(=O)NCC1", pen)  # use piping to change the behavior as desired depiction() %>%   highlight_atoms(atms, color$LIGHT_GRAY) %>%   highlight_atoms(bnds, color$LIGHT_GRAY) %>%   highlight_atoms(lactam, color$RED) %>%   set_size(400, 400) %>%   set_zoom(3) %>%   outerglow() %>%   add_title() %>%   depict(pen) %>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

title: Basic-Use
code: # laoding a molfile insulinmol <- system.file("molfiles/ChEBI_5931.mol", package="depict") insulin    <- read_mol(insulinmol)  cysteine <- match_smarts("C(=O)C(CS)N", insulin) xlinks   <- match_smarts("SS", insulin)  depiction()%>%    set_size(700, 400) %>%   set_zoom(10) %>%   outerglow() %>%   highlight_atoms(cysteine, color$YELLOW) %>%   highlight_atoms(xlinks, color$YELLOW) %>%   depict(insulin)%>%   get_image() %>%   grid::grid.raster()

text: Depict molecule using depiction generator. Display options set Generator. function applies settings given molecule set molecules.

text: dg Required. DepictionGenerator mol Required. AtomContainer

text: dg Required. Depiction Generator color Required. java.awt.Color highlights Required. list CDK IChemOjbects, usually atoms bonds

text: Find matches given molecule using SMARTs pattern.

text: smarts SMARTS string mol CDK IAtomContainer limit limit number matches

title: parse_smiles — parse_smiles
text: smi Required. smiles string generatecoords Optional. Default TRUE. Whether generate coordinates smiles kekulise Optional. Boolean. Default TRUE

title: set_zoom — set_zoom
text: dg Depiction Generator zoom Optional. Default 1

title: depict 0.3.0
text: modify match_smarts use toChemObjects methodinstead toAtomBondMap due issue Java reflection. add atomcontainer_list_to_jarray allow passing arrays molecules depict Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
